metadata.title: About
metadata.description: Health In Cloud - Orthophonic and neuropsychological rehabilitation platform to support patients in rehabilitation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: Health In Cloud is a web platform dedicated to orthophonic and neuropsychological rehabilitation, designed to support patients in rehabilitation.
mission.p2: Our mission is to provide rehabilitation patients with permanent access to guided exercises, with personalized tracking and instant feedback, enabling autonomous practice between therapy sessions.

access.description: You can obtain a copy of all your personal data.

rectification.title: Right of Rectification (Art. 16)
rectification.description: You can request the correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.

erasure.title: Right to Erasure (Art. 17)
erasure.description: You can request the deletion of your data under certain conditions.

limitation.title: Right to Restriction (Art. 18)
limitation.description: You can request the limitation of processing of your data.

portability.title: Right to Data Portability (Art. 20)
portability.description: You can receive your data in a structured and commonly used format.

objection.title: Right to Object (Art. 21)
objection.description: You can object to the processing of your data for reasons relating to your particular situation.

withdraw.title: Withdrawal of Consent (Art. 7.3)
withdraw.description: You can withdraw your consent at any time.
